oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poultry
Markets and trade
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Health and welfare
Feeding and growth
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Regular bulletin with technical updates of the Organic Advisory Service Issue contains: Battling on for Avian Flu preventive vaccination; Organic Colombian Blacktail eggs; UK Co-existence - GMOand non-GMO crops; Aspects of Poultry Behaviour; CAP in the service of biodiversity; Seeing the Wood, the Trees and the Catch 22; Beware of organic market "statistics"; A central role in energy reviews
